input: Imagine a self-contained, hypothetical world with only the following conditions, and without any unmentioned factors or causal relationships: Smoking has a direct effect on effort and freckles. Effort has a direct effect on freckles. Method 1: We look at how smoking correlates with freckles case by case according to effort. Method 2: We look directly at how smoking correlates with freckles in general. To understand how smoking affects freckles, is it more correct to use the Method 1 than Method 2?
